alert.note: Alert for Adams; Taylor (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 05 at 3:42PM CST until March 05 at 4:15PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN ADAMS AND NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 342 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Corning, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Adams and northwestern Taylor Counties, including the following locations... Corning Municipal Airport and Prescott. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
